text: Message from The Prime Minister of India, Shri Narendra Modi - http://pmindia.gov.in/pmmessage.php pic.twitter.com/BCkE3ya4YP
The visuals touched both Nawaz Sharif ji & his Mother. He told me that after seeing the visuals his Mother got very emotional.
This time when he was eating with his Mother he saw visuals on TV of my Mother offering me sweets.
Nawaz Sharif ji told me that he stays in Islamabad but goes to meet his Mother once in a week.
Earlier in the evening in my conversation with Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif he shared some very emotional things.
The Prime Minister of India, Shri Narendra Modi along with Hon'ble President of India & leaders of other countries.pic.twitter.com/7FwoOENWPv
Reached Gujarat Bhavan after the programmes at Rashtrapati Bhavan. Will begin my 1st official briefing meeting with officials shortly.
I welcome the arrival @narendramodi ji as the 15th Prime Minister of India & wish the new Ministers well. Jai Hindpic.twitter.com/0H7mWhZfTd

The transfer of the PM's website has been much smoother than the twitter handle. I wonder why.
No selfies on stage!!!! Remarkable restraint :-)
@thekiranbedi it's all relative ma'am. I just flew in from Srinagar this afternoon so this isn't my idea of pleasant weather :-)
Dear PM hopefuls if you want to have a big oath taking ceremony outdoors please time elections so we can do this in the winter :-)
Congratulations to the nation's 15th Prime Minister @narendramodi & his council of ministers. #ModiCabinet
"The old order changeth yielding place to new...." Alfred Tennyson
Congratulations to @narendramodi as he takes the oath as 15th PM of our nation. His team looks impressive & wishing them all the success.
What fun to sit here & watch the new power dynamic unfold.
LIVE webcast of The Swearing - in - Ceremony of the PM and the Union Council of Ministers will be available LIVE at http://www.yuva4india.tv/
I hope they hand over a better India to their successors when the time comes to do so. That's the very least we can expect or hope for. 2/2
For what it's worth I wish Team Modi the very best as they embark on a journey to govern India for the next five years 1/2
Sorry, the second tweet seems to have been in a greater hurry than the first unless it got caught up in Delhi's epic traffic mess today :-)
A big thank you to all friends who will be viewing the ceremony on TV and through social media. Your constant support & blessings mean a lot
I am glad & honoured that people from all walks of life will join the swearing in ceremony. I welcome them.
Leaving for Rashtrapati Bhavan in a while. Last time I attended an Oath Ceremony on the forecourt was in 1999, seems like yesterday 1/2
Thank you Lata Didi. As always, your greetings and best wishes inspire me deeplypic.twitter.com/TRcMpoA3cg
Offered tributes to Bapu at Raj Ghat earlier today http://nm4.in/1nKmzmt pic.twitter.com/XV3zussxtX
I remember my name being called out & taking the oath of office & secrecy administered by President Narayanan. How time flies 2/2
Smt.Gandhi expressed the hope that railways was taking all steps possible for relief and safety of the victims and stranded passengers.(3/3)
Anguished at death of passengers,Smt.Gandhi extended condolences to the family of the dead & wished a speedy recovery to those injured.(2/3)
Smt.Sonia Gandhi has expressed shock and grief over the unfortunate accident of #Gorakhdham Express near Khalilabad in UP today. (1/3)
Spoke to the Cabinet Secretary. Asked him to take an overview of the situation & ensure timely assistance to those injured.
My condolences to families of those who lost their lives in the Gorakhdham express tragedy. Prayers with the injured.
On my way to Atal ji's residence to seek his blessings.
